short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help you write beautiful Linkedin post by providing missing formatting options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedIn CoComposer provide you the following options:

1. Easily apply bold, italics, or bold italics from the LinkedIn post editor itself.

2. Format your posts seamlessly without leaving LinkedIn.

3. Emphasize your key points and make your posts stand out.
